name: Dark Confrontation
description:
You are an elite member of the Alpha Special Forces. You were sent to a zombie infested village. Your task is to destroy all creatures. You have at your disposal a whole arsenal of weapons consisting of 6 units. Zombies scattered throughout the village in flocks, you need to destroy them all.
Kill all the critters and go home.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
